content: Homeland Security agency monitoring cross-border movement. Deployed advanced scanning at major checkpoints.
metadata: Operation name: Watchtower, region: Northern Customs, started: 2024-12

content: CyberSec Taskforce under Ministry of Defense focusing on 'RedCipher' infiltration attempts. Partnerships with tech private sector.
metadata: Operation code: Firewall2025, classification: SECRET, ongoing

content: Joint Ops unit forming maritime exercise with ally nation, referencing IB-105. Phase 1 planning complete.
metadata: Exercise name: SeaShield, date: Q3 2025, classification: SECRET

content: Anti-smuggling taskforce raids in Sector 4. Confiscated contraband electronics per IB-104 leads.
New sub-agency formed for data privacy oversight if Bill S-1024 (LB-202) passes. Preliminary staff identified.
metadata: Provisional name: DataReg Board, bridging national security & privacy concerns
